content.rendered:
Directed by Bikas Ranjan Mishra.

Written by Bikas Ranjan Mishra.

Cast Sanjay Suri(Dhaval). Tannishtha Chatterjee(Dhaniya). Riddhi Sen(Bajrangi). Soham Maitra(Santu (as Soham Moitra)) . Arpita Chatterjee(Nidhi (as Arpita Pal)). Dhritiman Chatterjee(Pandey). Suraj Gunjal(Muttan). Delzad Hiwale(Sambhu). Anshuman Jha(Raghu). Ena Saha(Mona). Swatilekha Sengupta(Jamuna Devi)

Language Hindi.

Producers Rahul Bhanja. Nina Lath Gupta. Mohan Mulani. Onir. Shivasish Seth. Raj Suri. Sanjay Suri.

Production Anticlock Films. Boundscript. Drishyam Films.
